short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a browser add-on icon that turns red when viewed site or product is on the boycott list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension serves as a tool designed to illuminate the associations between prominent brands and websites and regimes that have been implicated in egregious actions against innocent populations. Examples include the impact of certain regimes on the Palestinian people, or the actions of specific governments affecting innocent Muslim civilians in Africa. These instances represent only a fraction of a broader spectrum of regimes involved in acts of violence and discrimination against Arab and Muslim nations on a global scale.
